LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.label: work frenzy

LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.label: go frenzy
LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.beginLetterContinue: \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] would like to join a caravan and venture into the world.
